course_description: Survey of figures and issues in contemporary theology, including doctrines of God, Christ, Holy Spirit, revelation, humanity, salvation, and eschatology. Opportunities for students to do constructive theology.
schedule_location: TTh 9:30am-10:50am in Rita Anne Rollins Building_322
